basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D21 (MIC=140 µM), Enterobacter cloacae b312 (MIC>300 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa OT97 (MIC>300 µM), Serratia marcescens Db 11 (MIC>127 µM), Serratia marcescens Db 1140 (MIC>127 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megatherium Bml1 (MIC=11 µM), Bacillus subtilis Bs11 (MIC=17 µM), Micrococcus luteus MIll (MIC=20 µM).
